Nile is committed to protecting your pa: Nile waxa uu ka shaqeynayo hubinta macluumaadka lacagtaada. Waxaannu u xoojinaynaa talooyin PCI DSS, adeegsanayna lambar furan, iyo sameynayna baaritaano ka hirgalinaya nidaamkiisa si loo hubiyo xogtaada sirta ah.
Protecting your privacy is important to: Xog ahmiyaddaaga waxay noqon kartaa. Fadlan aqbal in xogtaada laga qabto iyo aan loo qarxin. Ma nala qadanin xogtaada shakhsi, waxaannu adeegsanaynaa xogtaada sirta ah iyo nidaamka cuntada si loo bixiyo adeegyadeena ilaaad wax u dhammaystaan.
Shop confidently on Nile knowing that if: Isticmaalka NILE ha ku hananin. Haddii waxba kuma soo baxo, waxaannu mar kasta kuugu dhiirrigelinaynaa.
Our customer service team is always here: Koox adeegga macaamiilkaaga waxaannu mar kasta kuugu diirrigelinaynaa haddaad u baahan tahay.
Return and refund policy: Siyaasadka kuu shaqeynta iyo soo bixinta

Select an order to get help with items,: Xulo wareeg ah si aad uga caawiyo waxyaabo, gacan ku dhiiglin, dib u eegis, ama bixinta lacagta, iwm.
Type and press enter: Ku qor oo dabool Enter key.
Something on your mind? We are here to h: Waxaad arki doontaan? Waxaan halkan nahay si aad u caawiso!
For questions on specific items, you can: Su'aallo ku saabsan waxyaabo gaar ah, waxaad nagu soo diri kartaa tariiqda ku yaal 'Nile app' ama 'nilegmp.com'.
For other questions on our policies or o: Su'aallaha kale ee ku saabsan xeerarkaaga ama mawduucyo kale, waxaan kuugu talinaynaa inaad yeelato Maktabada Taageerada ee aanu su'aallaha la jawaabino oo aad ugu dhow kaga jawaabiyo su'aallahaada caanka ah. Farxad iyo xidig xaajiya!
You can use the search button at the top: Waxaad isticmaalaysaa badhanka raadiyaha ee ku yaal 'Nile Market Place app' ama 'Nile Market Place.com' si aad waxyaabo u raadiso.
Describe what you're looking for in the: Sifra waxaad raadisaa fadlan ku qor waxaad ku raadisaa ee aad raadiso. Tusaale ahaan: 'libaax xamaali,' ama 'shaatiyaad dhar dhuxush.' Fadlan isticmaali kala qaybsanaanta fudud si aad u sii wado natiijada. Tusaale ahaan, isticmaalka kala qaybsanaanta 'libaax xamaali' ayaa inta badan soo saaro natiijada la isku darayo 'libaax.'
Search results are ordered by how releva: Natiijada raadinta waxaa laga helayaa xaaladda ay waxyaabaha ugu xigaan su'aaladaada. Waxaad isticmaali kartaa khadka 'Raadi' si aad u raadiyo natiijadaada qaybtaada.
For searches that you would like to trac: Raadiyaha ku saabsan heerka aad u soo hagaarto, waxaad u leedahay koboc 'Save' oo dhuxul ah si aad u hesho xogta heerka waxyaabo cusub oo lagu saleeyo su'aashaaga.
When you shop on Nile, if you have any q: Marka aad xaridto Nile, haddii aad su'aal qaato ku saabsan waxyeelo, fadlan soo wac si aad ugu su'aalo halkan oo kahor.
Rest assured that you can shop confident: Soo dhawayso in aad xarido ku haysato amniga iyo caddaanka Xarunta Nile Market Place iyo Barnaamijka Himilada Nile Market Place.
Almost all items you bought on Nile Mark: Dhammaan waxyaabo aad ku xarido ku yaal Nile Market Place waxay kuu leedahay qaab la xiriira dabaqyada iyo dib u eegidda illaa 90 maalmood haddii aadan ka rabin, maadaama oo ay yihiin qaar ka mid ah halisyooyinka soo socda:
Clothing items that have been worn, wash: Waxyeelada libaaxa oo lagu gubo, dhugeyso, dhaawacayo, ama aan la gubin hashiye, duubka, ama calaamadaha nabadgelyada la isu qaatay, ama ay yihiin qayb ka mid ah heerka aan la soo koobin.
Items specifically labeled as non-return: Waxyaabo gaar ah oo loo macneeyo in laga qaado.
In addition, under the Nile Market Place: Sidoo kale, iyadoo xeerarkeena Himilada Nile Market Place Purchase Protection, waxaan si buuxda u bixiynaa lacagaha dhamaan waxyaabo aanu soo gaarin, soo daayey, ama aanu ku sheegnay.
Once you click checkout and complete you: Marka aad daboolo 'ka qaybqaad' iyo kufinayso lacagtaada, mudan! Waxaad horay u sheegtay xaridhkaada ku yaal Nile Market Place. Waxaan kugu dirinaynaa emayl oo ku saabsan waxyaabo ku yaal amarkaaga. Waxaad sidoo kale arki kartaa macluumaadka amarkaaga si aad u aragto 'Amarkaaga' ku yaal bogga xisaabtaaga ka webka 'Nile Market Place app' ama 'Nile Market Place.com'.
If you received an email confirmation ab: Haddii aad hesho diiwaan aanu soo saaray amarka aad ku yeeshay, marka hore waxaad arki doontaa qoysadaada iyo saaxiibbadaada si ay u muujiyaan inay isku dayso xisaabtayda si ay u amarto. Waxay sidoo kale noqon kartaa in:
Someone may have misspelled their email: Qof kasta oo iska diiwaanaya xisaabtayda Nile Market Place ayaa qorshay inuu iska dayo xisaabtayda marka uu ka diwaan-geliyo
Someone may have created a Nile Market P: Qof kasta oo iska diiwaanaya xisaabtayda Nile Market Place ayaa sameeyay iska diiwaan-gelinta xisaabtayda iyada oo adeegsanaya e-mail-kaaga
Someone may have placed an order from a: Qof kasta oo diiwaan-gelayaasha ayaa amar ku yeeshay kumbuyuutar halka aad iska diiwaangelisay Nile Market Place
If you suspect fraudulent activity, we r: Haddii aad ku dayatid waxyaabaha xumaan, waxaan ku talinaynaa inaad ku beddesho daynta xisaabtayda si loo hirgeliyo xisaabtayda iyo looga joojiyo amarkaaga ku saabsan aanu ogayn.
Keep track of the shops you love by foll: Gacan ku dhiiglad fadlan dukaamada aad jeceshahay si aad uga tagnato Nile Market Place!
All you need to do is go to their indivi: Waxaad u baahan tahay inaad u socoto bogga dukaankooda gaar ah oo ku yaal waxyeeladooda, kana dhagaysato koboca 'Follow'.
You can find the shop that sells the ite: Waxaad helayso dukaan ee ku yaal waxyaabo aad jeceshahay, fadlan isticmaal magacaaga oo ku taallo bogga tafaasiilka waxyaabaha ama bogga tafaasiilka amarkaaga.
To view the shops you've followed, go to: Si aad u aragto dukaannada aad raadinayso, booqo bogga xisaabtayda ku yaal 'Nile Market Place app' ama 'Nile Market Place.com'. Guji 'Dukaanno raadinayso' si aad u aragto dukaannada aad jeceshahay.
Here are some best practices to help ens: Halkan waxaad heli kartaa baahiyeyaasha ugu fiican ee lagu caawiyo in lagu xarido ku yaal Nile Market Place.
Never give your full credit card number,: Ha bixin nambarka karta xadidaaga oo dhan, nambarka shahaadiga fulinta, ama eraybixinta si toos ah kuwaas oo la soo diray, Farshaxanka Suuqyada Nile, ama telefoonka.
Check your credit card statement regular: U keen kartid warbixinta karta xadidaaga si aad ugu kordhiso lacagta iyo faalada karta.
If you share your computer or device, si: Haddii aad qashasho kumbuyuutarka ama qalabka, ka soo bax tirada xisaabtayada bogga webiga ka hor intaadan qof walba u ogolaan.
Change your passwords on a regular basis: Isbeddel cad si ku habboon ah ayuu u baahnaa khaladkaaga. Waxaa jira nambarkaasi, wuxuuna kuu caawin doonaa.
Keep track of your credit card: who is a: Ka aqbal nambarka karta xadidaaga: nin ma uu oggolaanayo inuu isticmaalo, iyo kii haasaawo.
Learn how Nile Market Place's return and: Baro sida siyaasadda dib u eegidda iyo daboolidda Nile Market Place ay kuu caawin karto inaad helo lacag buuxa kuwaas oo ku jira wakhti xadidan. Dhammaan waxyaabo aad xarido ku yeeshay Nile Market Place waxay kuu oggolaanaysaa dib u eegidda iyo daboolidda haddii aadan ka fiicanayn, maadama oo uu u baahnaanayo tiro ay wakiilno kale yihiin: (1) Waxyeelado libaaxa oo lagu gubo, dhugeyso, dhaawacayo, ama aan la gubin hashiye, duubka, ama calaamadaha nabadgelyada la isu qaatay, ama ay yihiin qayb ka mid ah heerka aan la soo koobin; (2) Waxyeelado gaar ah oo lagu macneeyo in laga qaado; (3) Waxyeelado la cusbooneysiinayo; (4) Baahiyeyaashyo balaadhan.
Learn about Nile Market Place's Purchase: Baro ku saabsan Barnaamijka Himilada Nile Market Place, oo aad kuu bixi karto dib u eegidda buuxa lacagaha haddii uu amarku noqon karo, soo daayo, ama uu ku jiro heerka aanu ku sheegnay.
Keep your transactions on Nile Market Pl: Habkaaga xidhiidha iyo helitaankaada waxaad ku hawlanaa Nile Market Place. Waxaanu helin ama ka caawiya inay jiraan habab kale oo ku xadgudban suuqyada Nile Market Place.
If you receive a suspicious email claimi: Haddii aad email ku dhow waan dambiileynay emailka, waxaad ku dhiirigelin kartaa adeegga macaamiilkaaga.
No, we do not support drop shipping on o: Maya, koronto ku weydiinayno waxay ku noqon doontaa koronto cago leh halkaas. Waxaannu isu xirnaa xubnaha maamulka soo go'anayaasha, abuurayaasha, iyo brandyada dhan ee dunida oo dhan, oo kujiraan goobta webiga ama 'Nile Market Place app'. Waxaanu ku talinaynaa inaad koronto ku weydiiso meel ku lug la'aan si aanu kaa caawiyo adeegyo dibadda, iyo inaad kala soo baxdid ofertada iyo hawsha ugu danbeeya. Waxaan kula talinaynaa inaad ugu dhamaystirto xaridada koowaad ee Nile Market Place!
Yes, we do accept certain tax exempt cer: Haa, waxaanu soo geliyay xawaaradaha kharashka, oo kuwaas oo ka mid ah hawl-wadeenada dawladda, ururka aan laga shaqayn, iyo hay'adaha kale ee shaqsiyadooda. Laakiin, haddaannu ansixin karin shahaadooyin isbahaysi ah oo lagu soo geliyo, ma soo geli karin shahaadooyin balaaran. Sidoo kale, shaqsiyadaha laga bilaabo shaqo ka badan maamulka awoodda iyo ka xidhnaanta kharashka waxay isu beddeshay si ay ugu raadsato heerka ku saleysan ee lacagta, laakiin aanay validin xaridadda internetka.
If you represent government bodies, nonp: Haddii aad ka qayb qaadatay dawladda, ururka aan laga shaqayn, iyo hay'adaha kale ee shaqsiyadooda, fadlan soo diri amaaradda hoose tax.exempt@Nile Market Place.com.
Proof of exemption in PDF format for the: Xeerarka in PDF format ee dalka(c) hawada waxaa loo diri karaa. Fadlan ogow, macluumaad aan la kala socon ee dokomintigaaga xaqiijinta (amas, taariikh, ma jiro in la go'iyo sanduuqa la raacay) wuxuu keenayaa codsadeeda inaad dib u soo gudbisid dokomintigaaga macluumaad ku saabsan.
The Nile Market Place user account email: Emailka xisaabtayda isticmaalka Nile Market Place ee ururkaaga
Organization Type: (Charitable / Religio: Nidaamka Ururka: (Nooca Qaranka / Diineed / Waxbarasho / Dowlad / Ururka aan laga shaqayn / Kahor intii kale)
Please note we do not accept sales tax p: Fadlan ogow, macluumaadka lagu ansixinayo shahaadooyinka cashuurta, tartanka guudaha, SSN, lisensooyinka shahaadooyinka, warqad lagu ansixiyay IRS (isagoo aanu xaqiijinayn qodobada sharciga dalka), W9, ama shahaadooyinka isdiyaarinta ah ma ahan tixgelin.
Nile Market Place connects customers dir: Nile Market Place wuxuu isu xirnaa siday ku caawi karto khadka caanka ah, kuna bixin kara soo saaraysha lacag u gaar ah. Kadibna waxaa laga soo dhex sheegay martiqaadaha badan iyo soo saarida goobaha ku taala fabriga ilaa gacanta qoyska, macaamiishu waxay helayaan qiimeynta xirfadle ah ee asalkeeda.
Why was my credit card declined during c: Sababta maxay ahayd in nambarka xadidaagu la iska saaray xagga lacagta?
How to check out as a guest on Nile Mark: Sida loo ka qaado oo ku jooji oo ah meesha Nile Market-place
Why can't I find my order in my account?: Maxaa ku kala socon kartaa xilkayga?
How can I make a change or modify items: Sida loo sameeyo isbeddel ama wax laga beddelo magacyada xilkayga?
How to get help with a purchased item: Sida loo helo caawinaad wax laga xarido
This Privacy Policy outlines how Nile Gl: Xeerkan Qarsoon waxay si guud uga hadasha sida Nile Global Marketplace (NGMP) ay koronto ku kicinayo, isticmaala, la wadaago, iyo xidhitaan ku sameeyo macluumaadka isticmaale ku wareeran NGMP app iyo website-ka.
NGMP collects personal details such as f: NGMP waxay ku kicisaa xogaha shakhsi sida magaca hore iyo dambe, cinwaanka iyo cinwaanka bixinta, macluumaadka lacag bixinta (EVC Plus), taariikhda duubista, iyo macluumaad kale oo loo baahan yahay si loogu bixin lahaa adeegyadayada.
To enhance the user experience and commu: Si loo kobciyo khibrada isticmaale iyo la wadaago xogaha xarida iyo adeegyada.
To improve and personalize the NGMP expe: Si loo kordhiyo khibrada isticmaale iyo ku dhiirrigelinta khibradan NGMP.
For displaying interest-based ads for fe: Si loo muujiyo oggolaanayaasha isticmaale ee xogaha danbe ee xaridada, waxyeellada, iyo adeegyada kale ee ay ku jiraan.
Use of cookies and other identifiers to: Isticmaaliddata kukiyooyinka iyo lambarka kale ee siyaasadda inay qaataan brausarada ama qalabka.
Users have the option not to provide cer: Isticmaaleyaasha waxay leeyihiin fursad aanay helin karin inay bixiyaan wax kasta oo xog ah, kaas oo ay ugu dheeraato xidhiidhka khibrada NGMP.
Users can add or update certain informat: Isticmaaleyaasha waxay ku darto ama cusbooneysiin kartaa wax kasta oo xog ah bogagga macluumaadka.
Users can adjust their Customer Communic: Isticmaaleyaasha waxay kala saaraan xulashada isticmaale ku jihada ee u qaadida email-ka ama wixii kale oo xiriir ah sida aan u wacnay.
For web browsing without linking to an a: Haddii loo adeegsado koronto aan lagu xidho, isticmaaleyaasha waxay galaan oo kusoo rogaan kukiyooyinka brausarka.
Transactions Involving Third Parties:: Falalka Ku Xadgudba Kuwa Saddexaadka ah:
Customer personal information related to: Macluumaadka shakhsiga ee isticmaale ku saabsan falalka la qodnaada kuwa saddexaadka ah waxaa lagu wadaagaya.
Third parties perform functions on our b: Kuwa saddexaadka ah ayaa hawshaasina adeegsada oo aanu u ogolaan doonin inay isticmaalaan macluumaadka shakhsiga uguna horreeyo.
In transactions involving business trans: Falalka la qodnaada ku saabsan dhaqaalaha loogu magacaabo, macluumaadka isticmaale waxaa ka mid ah hantida loo soo gaabanayo sida caadiga ah.
We release personal information when nec: Waxaan bixinaynaa macluumaadka shakhsiga marka ay u baahan yihiin in sharciga la qabto; hirgelinta heshiisyada; ama difaacidda xaquuqda, mallamacaadka, ama nabadgelyada NGMP, isticmaaleyaasha, ama dadka kale.
Data Retention and Security Measures: Koronto Ku Soo Gudbinta iyo Tallaabooyinka Nabadda
We design our systems with user security: Waxaan qaadi doonnaa nidaamkaaga oo kusoo dhexgeli kara kalsooni iyo qarsoonka isticmaale.
We use encryption protocols and software: Waxaan isticmaalnaa bixin caafimaad protocols iyo software si aan macluumaadka shakhsiga ugu xidho markii loo soo dirayo.
We adhere to the Payment Card Industry D: Waxaan si buuxda uga duwanaanaynaa Xeerka Xogaha Dhaqaalaha Geeddi-socodka Lacagta (PCI DSS) markii ay noqoto xogaha ka saaraysa nambarka lacagta.
We maintain physical, electronic, and pr: Waxaan dhisnaa dhammaan xoogga ah, elektronik, iyo tallaabooyinka kala duwanaanshaha oo loo isticmaalo macluumaadka isticmaale.
Our security procedures may require us t: Hababka xogaha ku saabsan macluumaadka shakhsiga waxay u baahan tahay inaanu ogeyn amaannadaagaaga ka hor inta aad macluumaadka shakhsiga qorto.
Xeerkaan waxaa laga dib-u-dhacayaa waqtiyo kordhin. Waxaan kugu ogaanaynaa waxa la midka ah ee kordhinta xeerka qarsoonkaaga.
For any questions about this Privacy Pol: Inta aanu la xoglaano ku saabsan xeerkan qarsoon, fadlan nala soo xiriir tirooyinka nala xogta ah.
